answers.answer: My good friend has endometriosis and after years and years of wanting to get pregnant she finally did kinda on accident lol. She is on the heavier side too but was able to carry a healthy baby boy to full term. She has issues but most were related to weight like gestational diabetes and high blood pressure.
That is really good to hear because I'm really scared mine was an accident too i never thought pregnancy would happen
I have bad endometriosis. And actually pregnancy has helped me alot. This is my 2nd pregnancy when I didn't think I could have 1. Good luck.
Thank you so much that is great news to hear gives me a little piece of mind
I have endometriosis. I carried until 38+3 and had a healthy baby girl.  Just think positive  mama!

When I first got married I tried to conceive for 3 years. The doctor gave me different meds and they finally said endometriosis is the problem. When I gave up on trying to conceive I got pregnant full term with my daughter. I tried again after 2 and a half years to get pregnant and couldn't. When I stopped trying, I got pregnant and I am almost 15 weeks and my first daughter will be 3 this month. My best advice to u is relax and don't stress bc that does put stress on the baby. Good luck!

You will be fine. I was in the same situation. I never thought I'd get pregnant, but then I did. And j had same kind of fears. Helps to go to the Dr every time u are scheduled and see the baby on moniter. Just do everything you are supposed to, like taking prenatals.. don't smoke or drink. Tru to eat as natural and healthy as possible. Best advice I can give :)
Thank you guys so much this puts my mind at ease and helps me relax knowing that i can be positive about this pregnancy i can't wait to get past the 12 weeks i think I'll b more at ease

question: I'm nervous this is my first pregnancy i never thought i would get pregnant and i was ok with that but then i skipped a period and tested positive but knw I'm wondering if any one has gone thru this what should i expect i don't want to get excited just to miscarry and be depressed I'm only 8 weeks and I'm scared i won't even carry past 3months :'(
title: sever endometriosis
